title: Cooperative Learning-based Social-Emotional Skills and Classroom Climate Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic collaboration experience and understanding of fundamental elementary science curriculum concepts
context.additional_context: Education combining collaborative learning and socio-emotional skills via science experiments and project-based activities, using BYOD online collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Through collaborative learning activities, learners can enhance effective communication and conflict-resolution skills with peers at a participation rate of at least 80%.
Learners achieve at least 70% proficiency in socio-emotional skills such as responsibility, empathy, and emotional regulation during science project execution.
Learners voluntarily apply and evaluate positive interaction strategies to improve classroom atmosphere at least three times over four weeks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
